column8: For me constraint and Chris Whitley are antithetical.  The doodles in the design are his, the line drawing is mine.  Powerful, muscular, lean, spontaneous, mutual, dangerous, respectful, unpretentious, what you see is what you get, are the words that come to mind when I think of him and hear his music.  Celebrate a great original musician with our Chris Whitley t shirt.
